Painfully average

Has put lots of micro transactions which cost overall over 4 times the games original price just for extra content.

Never tried to change up the game to see how to make it better but just keep the formula of survivors try to escape via generators to power gates to escape while killer hunts them to try and kill them.

Overall, it can be fun with others and has a fair amount of content but would not recommend for the long haul as you may find you get burnt out eventually due to lack of change in the game play.

Primeramente, un juego de mierda, por que la hitbox que tienen los personajes son una completa basura, uno atraviesa la ventana pero el asesino igual te pega a traves de la puta pared, UNA PUTA MIERDA, COMO TANTO, APARTE COMPARTE SERVIDOR CON LOS MACACOS CULIAOS QUE TIENEN LOS SERVIDORES EN SU PUTA CASA, PONEN EL SERVIDOR EN EL UNICO PAIS DONDE SE HABLA IDIOMA MONGOL, ES UNA PUTA BASURA, NO LO VALE, HASTA QUE ARREGLEN LA PUTA BASURA DE LA HITBOX Y LOS RANGOS DE MIERDA QUE TIENEN LOS ASESINOS PARA DARTE UN HIT, APATE UNO TIRA CHUNGO Y LA WEA TE PEGA IGUAL, DE QUE MIERDA SIRVE LLEVAR UNA PERK DE MIERDA QUE ES PARA ESQUIVAR UN MALDITO GOLPE SI NI SIQUIERA CUMPLE SU PUÑETERA FUNCION.
its fun

Lots of people dont like the game because they dont understand that before you can really get into the game and enjoy yourself, you have to understand the mechanics and how its played. Its extremely confusing when you first start and you wont know whats going on at all unless you play the game and figure all the stuff out. There is a ton of stuff in here that they just throw in your face but you REALLY just need to play and it will all fall into place like a frustrating ass puzzle.  Basically you gotta get good before you can have fun, but boy is the game fun. The dopemine you get from fixing generators and outrunning beasts from hell is defiently a good one. But overall, just play the game and watch someone explain it a bit better and in a couple hours you'll be having the time of your life.

Also it wouldnt hurt if they could nerf the monsters a bit so they didnt run at the speed of light

PERO ESTA COMPLETAMENTE ROTO, LAS ASQUEROSAS PREMADES SON UN CANCER PARA EL JUEGO TOTALMENTE INJUSTO 4 JUGADORES COMUNICADOS CONTRA 1 VIENDO LO QUE HACES CADA MOVIMIENTO, OBJETO, GENERADOR TRAMPILLA YA ESTAN AVISADOS, LOS GENERADORES SE REPARAN SUPER FACIL Y SE LLEGA A RANGO 1 SOLO REPARANDO SIN SABER JUGAR ABSOLUTAMENTE NADA Y DE ASESINO TE DEJAS TODO SACAS PARTIDA CASI PERFECTA Y NI TE DAN EL PUNTO PARA SUBIR INCREIBLE.
EL JUEGO ESTA DESNIVELADO A MAS NO PODER SI LO RECOMIENDO JUGAR EN PLAN CASUAL, PERO JAMAS INVERTIRLE DINERO PRECIOS ABUSIVOS PARA QUE A LA FINAL SIEMPRE JUEGUES EN DESVENTAJA SI TU ROL ES DE SER EL ASESINO.

ok, its been a year since I played but ill leave a review now, this game has got me pretty damn addicted but there's a huge balancing issue, it swaps from being easy for survivors to easy to killers, currently, if you don't have the right killer with the right perks, killer loses whenever you're in high ranks if the survivors know how to play the game, however! some killers are ridiculously powerful mainly pyramid head and deathslinger, just their kits alone are op as hell let alone add-ons and perks, pyramid head not only doesn't have to hook you if you walk into his most of the time unavoidable traps but can murder you instead of having to get a final hook on you. deathslinger has a GUN straight up GUN that shoots spears that pull survivors towards him, this is almost impossible to break in time and can be done twice in a row to down you basically giving him the power of old legion without the fast vaults and needing to hit you a ton of times to down you on a mend, the only way I've seen to rank up effectively and win against all odds against one of those two killers, not even counting the cannibal now being buffed for some strange reason, is to play with at least 1 friend so if you do not have a friend to play with or don't want to make friends through this game see below...

TLDR: DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME ALONE, without the planning in voice comms you likely won't like this game

P.S. killers camp and survivors are toxic and bully anybody who isn't playing a good killer or playing badly

P.S.S. why did yall nerf nurse she was the only killer that required skill as a killer to be S+ tier

Eigentlich ein sehr gutes Spiel. Viele Verschiedene Arten von vererbbaren Fähigkeiten und diverse Killer aus klassischen Slasher Filmen. 
Das große Problem welches auch viele andere Reviewer genannt haben ist, dass der Schwierigkeitsgrad sehr sehr flexibel ist. Wer möchte kann sich durch Perks und Items das Spiel sehr einfach oder sehr schwer machen, allerdings erfährt dies der Gegner nicht. Das führt oft dazu dass for fun builds gegen tryhards spielen müssen was auf beiden Seiten für viel Frustration sorgt.
Auch der Zugang zu Schlüsseln (lässt Überlebende sofort entkommen) und Mori (lässt Killer die Überlebenden extrem schnell töten) sollte meiner Meinung nach Eingeschränkt werden. Ein guter Lösungsansatz wären Casual und Ranked Modi, oder Perk/Item/Killer bans vor dem Match. Leider scheint keins dieser Features in näherer Zukunft implementiert zu werden.

Dennoch ein sehr gutes Gelegenheitsspiel mit oder ohne Freunde, solang man es nicht zu ernst nimmt.

Итак начнем , где то пол года назад игра была достойной , ранги и опыт игроков соответствовал реалиям. Сейчас разработчики забили на пользователей от слова совсем . Куча багов и несправедливых присуждений рангов и умений . Письма в тех поддержку не дает никакого толка , только отписки . С тебя тупо списывают несправедливо опыт сколько бы ты очков не наиграл . Не тратьте деньги на это г....но !!!! Если вам жалко нервов . игра перестала соответствовать своим заданным стандартам. Куча читеров и накрутчиков в игре . Буду требовать возврата средств !!!! Игра опустилась на дно и с каждым днем становится все хуже. Пожалейте свои средства.
Эта игра хорошая, интересная, но в ней очень токсичное комьюнити, особенно выжившие, они беспощадны к маньякам.
